title: Ep. 56 - I Wanna Be Rich
description:
On today's episode, the guys dive deep into March Madness and discuss their bets and who's doing well and who's getting slaughtered. They also get into a lengthy conversation about the way toys have changed since Todd and Gorms were kids, and the guys have a few thoughts on jigsaw puzzles as well. Pat gives a rundown about his run-in with the NCAA his rookie year with the Colts and how they continually to be the most short-sighted corporation in the world. The guys also discuss Gorms budding rivalry with Singh, the gas station worker who works up the road from the boys and recently ABSOLUTELY BODIED Gorman over a $3.99 charge discrepancy, and lastly the guys all discuss their different morning routines on workdays, and how real Zito and heel Zito have very different rituals. As always, the guys each pick a song to help launch you into the weekend with some Friday Bangerz. It's a fun one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy
dc:creator: The Pod
